contentList.content: Between realms exists a dark abyss where the gods' twisted failures at mortal life go to rest. They are suspended in animation, petrified so that their monstrous form never pierces the vision of the mortal realms. Until now.

The mighty Beholder's essence compressed into a humanoid shape. This monstrosity was the first and greatest failure of the gods; its psyche the shattered attempt to meld the personalities of the Beholder into one.
Dust and dirt will collide and become one with the weakness that is flesh. Petrify those struck by this beam.
Discharge your otherworldly energies into a massive blast, consuming all in its path.
Enchant your victim with promises of a better life. Dreams overtake them, and they are thrust into a deep slumber.
Feast on the psyche of your prey. Their dreams will nourish your mind and strengthen your body.
